summary: Converts a raster to a vector.
description: Converts a raster data cube into a vector data cube. The bounding polygon of homogenous areas of pixels is constructed.

parameters.name: projection
parameters.description:
Coordinate reference system to reproject the converted vector. Specified as an [EPSG code](http://www.epsg-registry.org/) or [WKT2 CRS string](http://docs.opengeospatial.org/is/18-010r7/18-010r7.html).
The default value is of the  input raster cube.

returns.description: Returns a converted vector data cube.
